Description: Sherd from shoulder of pottery transport amphora; inscribed. Clay fine with some white inclusions and a little mica. Painted on the wheel.
Curator's comments: The character of the clay and the thickness of the wall are perhaps at the edge of the range found in Attic 'à la brosse' jars.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.056)
